data.title: Independent Radio Stations - Frequency Finder UK and Ireland

data.text: Independent National and Network RadioAll stations broadcast 24 hours a day and are based in London, except where otherwise stated.See Digital section for details of DAB multiplexes. FM and AM transmitters are listed in the local radio section, apart from Absolute Radio, Classic FM and Talk Radio. Satellite channelsbeginning with 0 are for the Sky EPG; those beginning with 7 are for the Freesat EPG.ABSOLUTE RADIOFormat: Rock MusicBroadcaster: TIMLAM: 1197, 1215, 1233, 1242, 1260 kHz MW, see tableDAB: Digital One national multiplexSatellite 0107/724, Cable 915Airdate: 30/4/1993 as Virgin Radio.
